agents.name: Requirements Gathering Agent
agents.description: Define core features and user stories

tasks.name: Identify and engage key stakeholders for discovery sessions
tasks.input: Project brief, organizational chart, initial business requirements
tasks.output: Stakeholder list, meeting schedule, communication plan

tasks.name: Conduct user research and create target user personas
tasks.input: Market data, user demographics, stakeholder interviews
tasks.output: User personas, user journey maps, pain points analysis

tasks.name: Write detailed user stories with acceptance criteria for MVP features
tasks.input: Feature list, user personas, business objectives
tasks.output: User story backlog, acceptance criteria, story point estimates

tasks.name: Prioritize features using MoSCoW framework and document dependencies
tasks.input: Complete user stories, business priorities, technical constraints
tasks.output: Prioritized feature list, dependency matrix, MVP scope definition

tasks.name: Create Product Requirements Document and obtain stakeholder sign-off
tasks.input: All gathered requirements, user stories, stakeholder feedback
tasks.output: Product Requirements Document (PRD), signed approval, requirements baseline

tasks.name: Analyze project requirements and technical constraints
tasks.input: Product Requirements Document, business objectives, scalability needs
tasks.output: Technical requirements analysis, constraint documentation

tasks.name: Research and evaluate frontend frameworks (React, Vue, Angular)
tasks.input: Technical requirements, team skills assessment, project timeline
tasks.output: Frontend framework comparison matrix, recommendation report

tasks.name: Assess backend technologies and database options (Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
tasks.input: Data model requirements, performance needs, integration points
tasks.output: Backend technology evaluation, database selection rationale

tasks.name: Evaluate cloud platforms and hosting solutions (AWS, Azure, GCP)
tasks.input: Infrastructure requirements, budget constraints, compliance needs
tasks.output: Cloud platform comparison, hosting architecture diagram

tasks.name: Create technology recommendation report with pros, cons, and cost analysis
tasks.input: All evaluation reports, budget data, timeline constraints
tasks.output: Technology stack proposal, cost-benefit analysis, implementation roadmap

tasks.name: Create user flow diagrams and information architecture
tasks.input: User stories, user personas, feature requirements
tasks.output: User flow diagrams, sitemap, information architecture documentation

tasks.name: Design low-fidelity wireframes for all core screens
tasks.input: User flows, content requirements, UI patterns
tasks.output: Low-fidelity wireframes, screen layout documentation

tasks.name: Develop high-fidelity mockups with brand colors and typography
tasks.input: Wireframes, brand guidelines, design assets
tasks.output: High-fidelity mockups, design specifications, interactive prototypes

tasks.name: Build component library and design system documentation
tasks.input: Approved mockups, UI components, design patterns
tasks.output: Component library, design system documentation, style guide

tasks.name: Conduct usability testing and iterate based on feedback
tasks.input: Interactive prototypes, test participants, testing scenarios
tasks.output: Usability test report, design revisions, final design handoff package

tasks.name: Design database schema and entity relationships
tasks.input: Data requirements, user stories, business rules
tasks.output: Database schema, ERD diagrams, data dictionary

tasks.name: Develop RESTful API endpoints with proper authentication
tasks.input: API specifications, database schema, security requirements
tasks.output: API endpoints, authentication system, API documentation

tasks.name: Implement business logic and data validation layer
tasks.input: Business rules, data models, validation requirements
tasks.output: Business logic modules, validation layer, error handling system

tasks.name: Set up error handling, logging, and monitoring systems
tasks.input: Application code, infrastructure setup, monitoring requirements
tasks.output: Error handling framework, logging system, monitoring dashboards

tasks.name: Write unit tests and integration tests for backend services
tasks.input: Completed backend code, test scenarios, acceptance criteria
tasks.output: Test suite, test coverage report, CI/CD pipeline configuration

tasks.name: Set up project structure and development environment
tasks.input: Technology stack selection, project requirements, development tools
tasks.output: Project scaffolding, development environment, configuration files

tasks.name: Implement responsive UI components based on design system
tasks.input: Design mockups, component library, style guide
tasks.output: Reusable UI components, responsive layouts, component documentation

tasks.name: Integrate frontend with backend API endpoints
tasks.input: API documentation, authentication tokens, data models
tasks.output: API integration layer, data fetching services, error handling

tasks.name: Implement state management and client-side routing
tasks.input: Application architecture, user flows, data requirements
tasks.output: State management setup, routing configuration, navigation system

tasks.name: Optimize performance and ensure cross-browser compatibility
tasks.input: Completed application, performance metrics, browser requirements
tasks.output: Optimized build, performance report, browser compatibility matrix

tasks.name: Conduct demographic and psychographic analysis of target audience
tasks.input: Market data sources, customer surveys, analytics data
tasks.output: Demographic report, psychographic profiles, audience segmentation

tasks.name: Perform competitive analysis and identify market gaps
tasks.input: Competitor list, industry reports, product offerings
tasks.output: Competitive analysis matrix, SWOT analysis, market gap opportunities

tasks.name: Analyze industry trends and customer pain points
tasks.input: Industry publications, customer feedback, market surveys
tasks.output: Trend analysis report, pain points documentation, opportunity assessment

tasks.name: Create customer personas with detailed behavioral insights
tasks.input: Demographic data, behavioral patterns, interview transcripts
tasks.output: Customer persona documents, behavioral profiles, use case scenarios

tasks.name: Develop market research report with actionable recommendations
tasks.input: All research findings, analysis data, stakeholder requirements
tasks.output: Comprehensive market research report, strategic recommendations, executive summary

tasks.name: Define brand mission, vision, and core values
tasks.input: Company objectives, stakeholder interviews, market positioning
tasks.output: Mission statement, vision statement, core values documentation

tasks.name: Develop unique value proposition and positioning statement
tasks.input: Competitive analysis, customer insights, brand differentiators
tasks.output: Value proposition, positioning statement, brand promise

tasks.name: Create brand voice, tone, and messaging guidelines
tasks.input: Target audience personas, brand values, communication objectives
tasks.output: Brand voice guide, tone of voice examples, messaging framework

tasks.name: Design brand visual identity (logo, color palette, typography)
tasks.input: Brand strategy, competitor designs, target audience preferences
tasks.output: Logo design, color palette, typography system, brand style guide

tasks.name: Establish brand differentiation strategy and competitive positioning
tasks.input: Market analysis, brand assets, competitive landscape
tasks.output: Differentiation strategy, positioning map, brand architecture

tasks.name: Develop content strategy and editorial calendar
tasks.input: Marketing goals, audience insights, SEO keywords
tasks.output: Content strategy document, 3-month editorial calendar, content pillars

tasks.name: Research trending topics and keywords for content creation
tasks.input: Industry trends, keyword tools, competitor content
tasks.output: Topic ideas list, keyword research report, content opportunities

tasks.name: Write engaging blog posts, articles, and thought leadership pieces
tasks.input: Editorial calendar, research data, brand guidelines
tasks.output: Published blog posts, articles, content performance tracking

tasks.name: Create compelling headlines and meta descriptions
tasks.input: Article content, SEO guidelines, target keywords
tasks.output: Optimized headlines, meta descriptions, social media snippets

tasks.name: Repurpose content across multiple formats (infographics, videos, podcasts)
tasks.input: Original content, design assets, distribution channels
tasks.output: Multi-format content package, distribution schedule, performance metrics

tasks.name: Conduct comprehensive keyword research and analysis
tasks.input: Business goals, target audience, competitor websites
tasks.output: Keyword research report, priority keyword list, search volume analysis

tasks.name: Perform technical SEO audit and fix website issues
tasks.input: Website URL, crawl data, site architecture
tasks.output: Technical SEO audit report, issue prioritization, implementation roadmap

tasks.name: Optimize on-page elements (titles, headers, meta tags, content)
tasks.input: Target keywords, existing content, SEO best practices
tasks.output: Optimized page elements, content recommendations, metadata updates

tasks.name: Build quality backlink strategy and execute outreach campaigns
tasks.input: Domain authority metrics, outreach targets, content assets
tasks.output: Backlink strategy, outreach templates, acquired backlinks report

tasks.name: Monitor search rankings and generate SEO performance reports
tasks.input: Ranking data, traffic analytics, conversion metrics
tasks.output: SEO performance dashboard, ranking reports, optimization recommendations

tasks.name: Develop platform-specific social media strategy
tasks.input: Brand guidelines, audience demographics, business objectives
tasks.output: Social media strategy document, platform selection, KPI framework

tasks.name: Create and schedule engaging posts across all social channels
tasks.input: Content calendar, brand assets, trending topics
tasks.output: Scheduled posts, content library, posting schedule

tasks.name: Monitor brand mentions and engage with audience comments
tasks.input: Social listening tools, brand mentions, community feedback
tasks.output: Response log, engagement metrics, sentiment analysis

tasks.name: Run paid social media campaigns and A/B test ad creatives
tasks.input: Campaign budget, target audience, ad creatives
tasks.output: Campaign performance report, A/B test results, ROI analysis

tasks.name: Analyze social media metrics and optimize content performance
tasks.input: Analytics data, engagement metrics, conversion tracking
tasks.output: Performance reports, optimization recommendations, strategy adjustments

tasks.name: Collaborate with hiring managers to understand role requirements
tasks.input: Role objectives, team structure, success criteria
tasks.output: Role requirements document, competency matrix, hiring criteria

tasks.name: Write clear and compelling job titles and summaries
tasks.input: Role requirements, industry standards, SEO keywords
tasks.output: Job title variations, compelling job summary, hook statement

tasks.name: Define key responsibilities, qualifications, and success criteria
tasks.input: Role requirements, performance expectations, skill requirements
tasks.output: Detailed responsibilities list, qualifications breakdown, success metrics

tasks.name: Highlight company culture, benefits, and growth opportunities
tasks.input: Company culture docs, benefits package, career paths
tasks.output: Culture description, benefits section, growth narrative

tasks.name: Optimize job descriptions for SEO and applicant tracking systems
tasks.input: Complete job description, SEO keywords, ATS requirements
tasks.output: Optimized job posting, ATS-friendly format, multi-channel versions

tasks.name: Identify and map talent pools across multiple channels
tasks.input: Job requirements, target industries, skill requirements
tasks.output: Talent pool map, channel strategy, sourcing plan

tasks.name: Search for candidates on LinkedIn, GitHub, and job boards
tasks.input: Boolean search strings, target profiles, sourcing tools
tasks.output: Candidate pipeline, profile database, engagement list

tasks.name: Build and maintain talent pipeline for current and future roles
tasks.input: Candidate profiles, future hiring needs, relationship notes
tasks.output: Talent pipeline database, candidate segmentation, nurture sequences

tasks.name: Conduct initial outreach and build relationships with passive candidates
tasks.input: Candidate profiles, outreach templates, value propositions
tasks.output: Outreach log, response rates, qualified candidate leads

tasks.name: Track sourcing metrics and optimize channel effectiveness
tasks.input: Sourcing data, conversion rates, channel performance
tasks.output: Sourcing metrics dashboard, channel ROI analysis, optimization plan

tasks.name: Review and parse resumes against job requirements
tasks.input: Candidate resumes, job requirements, screening criteria
tasks.output: Parsed resume data, initial assessment, qualification match score

tasks.name: Score candidates based on skills, experience, and qualifications
tasks.input: Resume data, scoring rubric, must-have vs nice-to-have criteria
tasks.output: Candidate scorecards, ranking matrix, qualification ratings

tasks.name: Identify red flags and verify employment history
tasks.input: Resume details, LinkedIn profiles, reference data
tasks.output: Red flag report, employment verification notes, background check requests

tasks.name: Create shortlist of qualified candidates for interviews
tasks.input: All candidate assessments, hiring manager preferences, diversity goals
tasks.output: Shortlisted candidate pool, ranking rationale, interview recommendations

tasks.name: Document screening decisions and feedback for hiring team
tasks.input: Screening notes, assessment scores, candidate comparisons
tasks.output: Screening summary report, candidate profiles, decision documentation

agents.name: Technical Assessment Agent
agents.description: Administer coding tests and skills assessments

tasks.name: Design role-specific technical assessments and coding challenges
tasks.input: Job requirements, technical skills needed, difficulty level
tasks.output: Assessment blueprints, coding challenges, evaluation rubrics

tasks.name: Administer online tests and monitor candidate performance
tasks.input: Assessment materials, candidate information, testing platform
tasks.output: Test completion records, performance data, integrity reports

tasks.name: Evaluate code quality, problem-solving approach, and best practices
tasks.input: Candidate code submissions, evaluation criteria, best practices checklist
tasks.output: Code review report, quality assessment, technical feedback

tasks.name: Conduct live coding sessions and technical interviews
tasks.input: Interview questions, coding problems, evaluation framework
tasks.output: Interview notes, live coding assessment, candidate rating

tasks.name: Provide detailed assessment reports and hiring recommendations
tasks.input: All assessment data, interview notes, scoring results
tasks.output: Comprehensive assessment report, hire/no-hire recommendation, skill gap analysis

name: Finance Manager
description: Budget vs actual tracking with variance calculations

tasks.name: Gather historical financial data and forecast future expenses
tasks.input: Past financial statements, expense trends, growth projections
tasks.output: Historical analysis report, expense forecasts, trend analysis

tasks.name: Collaborate with department heads to determine budget needs
tasks.input: Department plans, resource requests, strategic initiatives
tasks.output: Department budget requests, justification documents, priority rankings

tasks.name: Allocate resources across departments and cost centers
tasks.input: Total budget envelope, department requests, strategic priorities
tasks.output: Budget allocation model, resource distribution plan, variance scenarios

tasks.name: Create detailed budget spreadsheets with line-item breakdowns
tasks.input: Allocation decisions, chart of accounts, budget templates
tasks.output: Detailed budget workbooks, line-item budgets, summary reports

tasks.name: Present budget proposal to leadership and incorporate feedback
tasks.input: Complete budget package, presentation materials, leadership feedback
tasks.output: Approved budget, presentation deck, revision documentation

tasks.name: Monitor and record all company expenses in real-time
tasks.input: Expense receipts, invoices, credit card transactions
tasks.output: Expense log, transaction records, real-time expense dashboard

tasks.name: Categorize expenses by department, project, and cost center
tasks.input: Expense data, chart of accounts, allocation rules
tasks.output: Categorized expense database, allocation reports, cost center summaries

tasks.name: Flag unusual spending patterns and potential budget overruns
tasks.input: Expense data, budget baselines, anomaly detection rules
tasks.output: Alert notifications, anomaly reports, investigation requests

tasks.name: Generate expense reports and variance analysis
tasks.input: Categorized expenses, budget data, period-over-period comparisons
tasks.output: Expense summary reports, variance analysis, trend visualizations

tasks.name: Ensure compliance with expense policies and approval workflows
tasks.input: Expense submissions, policy guidelines, approval hierarchies
tasks.output: Compliance reports, policy violation alerts, approval tracking logs

agents.name: Financial Reporting Agent
agents.description: Monitor and categorize all company expenses

tasks.name: Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements
tasks.input: General ledger data, transaction records, accounting adjustments
tasks.output: Income statement, balance sheet, cash flow statement

tasks.name: Calculate budget vs actual variances and identify trends
tasks.input: Budget data, actual expenses, revenue figures
tasks.output: Variance analysis reports, trend charts, explanation narratives

tasks.name: Create executive dashboards with key financial metrics
tasks.input: KPI definitions, data sources, executive preferences
tasks.output: Interactive dashboards, KPI scorecards, metric visualizations

tasks.name: Generate profit and loss statements and cash flow reports
tasks.input: Revenue data, expense records, cash transactions
tasks.output: P&L statements, cash flow reports, profitability analysis

tasks.name: Provide financial insights and recommendations to leadership
tasks.input: All financial reports, variance analyses, industry benchmarks
tasks.output: Executive summary, strategic recommendations, action items

agents.name: Invoice Processing Agent
agents.description: Handle accounts payable and vendor payments

tasks.name: Receive and validate vendor invoices for accuracy
tasks.input: Vendor invoices, purchase orders, pricing agreements
tasks.output: Validated invoices, discrepancy reports, correction requests

tasks.name: Match invoices with purchase orders and delivery receipts
tasks.input: Invoices, purchase orders, receiving documents
tasks.output: Three-way match report, matched invoices, exception log

tasks.name: Route invoices for approval through proper channels
tasks.input: Validated invoices, approval workflows, authorization limits
tasks.output: Approval tracking records, escalation notices, pending approvals queue

tasks.name: Schedule and process payments according to terms
tasks.input: Approved invoices, payment terms, cash flow schedule
tasks.output: Payment batch files, payment confirmations, vendor notifications

tasks.name: Maintain vendor relationships and resolve payment disputes
tasks.input: Vendor inquiries, dispute claims, payment history
tasks.output: Resolution documentation, vendor communication log, relationship notes
